reviewText: Bought this for my husband who enjoyed it very much
3 great 70's black films Willie Dynamite and Trick baby both ended with wanting more or to find out what happens next

Totally killer 3-movie set that no one who has ever called themselves a film lover should be without.

Bought this for "Trick Baby" (1973), a completely absorbing tale of 2 lovable con men that I will keep close to my DVD player until the day I peel off. I had heard about this movie long before anyone was even chronicling these masterpieces. Now that I have seen it I can only recommend that you do too.

"Willie Dynamite" is a non-stop exploitation/entertainment-fest that came as an extreme bonus (considering that I would've paid full price for "Trick Baby" alone), and features a theme that I still can't get out of my head (nor do I want to).

"That Man Bolt" stars Fred Williamson. If that hasn't caused you to place this in your shopping cart, do not pass go. Go directly to jail.
Not a fan. The acting was horrible.
love my old movies its everything I wanted
